attributes.action: Ban fuels such as diesel and petrol and replace them with cleaner ones. eg Hydrogen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Have all new vehicles' engines to work on clean fuels such as Hydrogen, and not petrol or diesel. This would ensure the world has cleaner air, and would save the world that little bit from global warming and sea rising. There should be a public service for modifying your engine and service stations nationwide should stock Hydrogen fuel cells.
